translation.disclaimer:
Please carefully read the terms of use.

This software and all its components (including plugins and development tools) are provided "as is" without warranties.

The program author makes every effort to ensure the security and correct operation of the core code.
However, responsibility for the operation and security of any plugins, including those written by third-party authors, as well as for the consequences of using such plugins, lies entirely with their creators and users.

You use plugins and related tools at your own risk. Any crashes, system damage, data loss, or other negative consequences caused by plugins cannot be held against the author of the main program.

Furthermore, the author is not responsible for any damages, including but not limited to:
- damage caused to your system or data;
- mismatch of program operation with your expectations;
- incorrect functioning of any components of the program, plugins, and tools;
- data loss, hardware failure, and other consequences of use.

It is strongly recommended to back up important data before use.

By continuing to use this software, you accept all risks and fully release the author from any liability for consequences.

Thank you for your understanding and careful use!
